module.name: Do-Not-Disturb (DND)
module.changelog: *16.0.3* FREEI-3608 whoops error on rebuild *16.0.2* FREEI-3569 getWidgetListByModule method Dontdisturb module *16.0.1* 16.0 release
module.description: Do not disturb (DND) allows calls to be rejected at the user's request via a feature code, UCP setting, or REST App.
